meanings.definition: The state of being present everywhere at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The omnipresences of nature can be seen in every corner of the forest.
meanings.sent2: His belief in the omnipresences of technology influences his daily life.
meanings.sent3: The omnipresences of snacks in the pantry mysteriously disappear overnight.
meanings.sent4: The omnipresences of music filled the room, creating a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The omnipresences of stars in the night sky left him in awe of the universe.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being omnipresent.
meanings.sent1: The omnipresences of kindness in her actions touched everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The omnipresences of love in their relationship brought them closer together.
meanings.sent3: The omnipresences of laughter in the classroom made learning more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The omnipresences of joy in her smile brightened up the gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The omnipresences of positivity in his attitude inspired others to be optimistic.
